info.title: Dogecoin - Blockchain Indexer API
info.description: Core indexer endpoints dedicated to Dogecoin metaprotocols.

get.description: Sum of koinu in UTxOs which reside at the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.description:
Map of all DRC20 tokens and corresponding total and available balances
controlled by the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.description:
Returns a map of all Dunes and corresponding amounts in UTxOs controlled by
the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

get.summary: Dune UTxOs by Address and Dune
get.description:
Return all UTxOs controlled by the specified address or script pubkey which
contain some of a specific kind of dune.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: dune
parameters.description: Dune, specified either by the Dune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: List of all inscriptions which reside at the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: List of all unused transfer inscriptions which reside at the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: DRC20 ticker string

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description:
List of all transactions which consumed or produced a UTxO controlled
by the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which transaction was included in a block)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only transactions included on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only transactions included on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: List of all UTxOs which reside at the specified address or script pubkey.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Dogecoin address or hex encoded script pubkey

parameters.name: filter_dust
parameters.description: Ignore UTxOs containing less than 100000 shibes

parameters.name: filter_dust_threshold
parameters.description: Ignore UTxOs containing less than specified shibes

parameters.name: exclude_metaprotocols
parameters.description: Exclude metaprotocol UTxOs (UTxOs involved in metaprotocols like dunes or inscriptions)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: List of tickers of all deployed DRC20 assets.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Information about the specified DRC20 asset.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: DRC20 ticker string

get.description:
Script pubkeys or addresses that hold the specified DRC20
token and corresponding total balances.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: DRC20 ticker string

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns a list of ID and names of all deployed Dune assets.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description:
Returns information about the specified Dune, including etching information,
current supply and number of holders.

parameters.name: dune
parameters.description: Dune, specified either by the Dune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

get.description: List of all addresses that hold the specified Dune, with the respective amounts.

parameters.name: dune
parameters.description: Dune, specified either by the Dune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description: Returns a list of UTxOs which contain some of the specified Dune.

parameters.name: dune
parameters.description: Dune, specified either by the Dune ID (etching block number and transaction index) or name (spaced or un-spaced)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of results per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which the results are sorted (by height at which UTxO was produced)

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or after a specific height

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Return only UTxOs created on or before a specific height

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string, use the cursor included in a page of results to fetch the next page

get.description:
Information about an inscription. A preview of the content body is given only if its type is
"text/plain". For the whole content, use the complementary endpoint, namely
`/assets/inscriptions/{inscription_id}/content_body`.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

get.description:
Paginated response of the content body byte array of an inscription. This endpoint is
complementary to the "Inscription Information" endpoint.

parameters.name: inscription_id
parameters.description: Inscription ID

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The max number of bytes per page

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor string: the offset in the content body. Use the cursor to query for the next page

content_body_page.description: Base64-encoded representation of a slice of the inscription content body. All types supported.

remaining_bytes.description: Number of bytes remaining in the inscription content body.

total_length.description: Number of bytes in entire inscription content body.

divisibility.description: If no divisibility was specified, then this equals 0

inscription_id.description:
String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal
transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal
transaction.

satoshis.description: Total number of satoshis in the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_block_height.description: Block height of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations of the block where the UTxO containing the inscription was created.

utxo_sat_offset.description: Inscribed sat offset in the UTxO containing it.

utxo_txid.description: Tx ID of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_vout.description: Output index of the UTxO containing the inscription.

content_body_preview.description:
Preview of inscription content body raw data. Max: 100 bytes.
Supported types: "text/plain", "text/plain;charset=utf-8", "application/json".

content_length.description: Length of entire inscription content body bytes array.

created_at.description: Block height of the reveal transaction.

inscription_id.description:
String representation of the inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal
transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of inscription in the reveal
transaction.

height.description: Height of the block which included the transaction

inscription_id.description:
String representation of an inscription ID, whose first coordinate is the reveal
transaction hash, and the second coordinate is the index of the new inscription.

sat_amount.description: Number of sats locked in the UTxO.

token_amount.description: Number of tokens locked in the UTxO.

utxo_block_height.description: Block height of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations of the block where the UTxO containing the inscription was created.

utxo_sat_offset.description: Offset of inscribed sat in the UTxO containing it.

utxo_txid.description: Tx ID of the UTxO containing the inscription.

utxo_vout.description: Output index of the UTxO containing the inscription.
